intro: Psychotria impatiens, commonly known as the "Impatient" or "Crimson Flame" plant, is a flowering species native to the tropical regions of the Americas. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes over 12,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its vibrant red flowers, which are often surrounded by green bracts, creating a striking visual contrast. It typically grows as an herbaceous perennial, often found in moist, shaded environments. Psychotria impatiens is also noted for its medicinal properties, with some traditional uses in herbal remedies.
